title: The Temper Trap - Science of Fear
description:
The amazing song that is circulating around the radio stations.

The Temper Trap - Science of Fear

_____________________________________________________________________________

BAND INFO:

The Temper Trap is a rock band from Melbourne, Australia. It is noted for its atmospheric sound, featuring grand guitars set to pulsating rhythms.[1]

The band is signed to Infectious Records worldwide, except for Australia and the United States. In Australia the group is signed to Michael Gudinski's label Liberation Music, and in the United States it is still unsigned.[2]

The Temper Trap first attracted the attention of the worldwide music industry after playing to sell-out crowds at the Musexpo in London. The band is currently working on a new album with veteran music producer Jim Abbiss.[3]

The BBC chose The Temper Trap on its top 15 Sound of 2009.[4]

Their song "Science of Fear" was remixed by the Drum & Bass artist Mistabishi, and appeared on the Hospital Records podcast #79. Their song "Sweet Disposition" was featured in the teaser trailer for "500 Days of Summer".
